sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-toolbar>
          <v-toolbar-title>Pisc√≠cola</v-toolbar-title>
          <v-combobox
            color="#325d79"
            solo
            hide-details
            class="ma-2"
            label="Seleccionar"
            :items="piscicolas"
            @change="() => updateEstanques()"
            v-model="id_piscicolas"
          ></v-combobox>
        </v-toolbar>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-toolbar>
          <v-toolbar-title>Estanque</v-toolbar-title>
          <v-combobox
            color="#325d79"
            solo
            hide-details
            class="ma-2"
            label="Seleccionar"
            :items="estanques"
            v-model="id_estanque"
          ></v-combobox>
        </v-toolbar>
      </v-col>
      <v-col class="text-center" cols="12">
        <v-btn color="#325d79" outlined>Visualizar</v-btn>
      </v-col>

      <v-col class="text-center" cols="12">
        <line-chart v-if="loaded" :chartdata="chartData" :options="chartOptions" />
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { postRequest } from '@/plugins/api.js'
import LineChart from './Chart.vue'

export default {
  name: 'LineChartContainer',
  components: { LineChart },
  created() {
    this.updatePiscicolas()
  },
  data() {
    return {
      piscicolas: [],
      estanques: [],
      id_piscicolas: '',
      id_estanque: '',
      dataCalculadafull: [],
      charData: [],
      chartOptions: [],
      loaded: false
    }
  },
  methods: {
    updatePiscicolas() {
      postRequest('piscicolas').then(response => {
        if (response.data.res == 200) {
          this.piscicolas = response.data.data.map(piscicola => ({
            text: piscicola.nombre_piscicola,
            value: piscicola.id_piscicolas
          }))
        } else alert(response.data.msg)
      })
    },
    updateEstanques() {
      postRequest('estanques', {
        id_piscicolas: this.id_piscicolas.value
      }).then(response => {
        if (response.data.res == 200) {
          this.estanques = response.data.data.map(estanque => ({
            text: estanque.nombre_estanque,
            value: estanque.id_estanque
          }))
        } else alert(response.data.msg)
      })
    },
    updateDataCalculada() {
      console.log('id_estanque ------>')
      console.log(this.id_estanque.value)
      postRequest('data_calculada', {
        id_estanque: this.id_estanque.value,
        initDate: this.initDate,
        finalDate: this.finalDate
      }).then(response => {
        if (response.data.res == 200) {
          this.dataCalculadafull = response.data.data
          console.log('datcalculada obtenidad del back ------>')
          console.log(this.dataCalculadafull)
        } else alert(response.data.msg)
      })
    },
    updateMediciones() {
      console.log('id_estanque ------>')
      console.log(this.id_estanque.value)
      postRequest('mediciones', {
        id_estanque: this.id_estanque.value,
        initDate: this.initDate,
        finalDate: this.finalDate
      }).then(response => {
        if (response.data.res == 200) {
          this.charData = response.data.data
          this.loaded = true
          console.log(
            'mediciones obtenidad del back guardadas en chardata------>'
          )
          console.log(this.chardata)
        } else alert(response.data.msg)
      })
    }
  }

}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped></style>
